Who Am I ?

About Me

I am an accomplished service and software engineer, boasting a remarkable 17-year track record of success in both domestic and international markets.
My expertise is further enhanced by my prestigious certification from MIT in full-stack development, earned in the illustrious August of 2023.
My commitment to perpetual learning and relentless pursuit of excellence in the ever-evolving realms of technology and innovation underscore my professional journey.

What I Do ?

Skills

Field service Engineer

I work as a service engineer, providing on-site support and maintenance for variety of systems. My skills in this area include:

    Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving abilities

  • Experience with preventive maintenance and repair procedures
  • Ability to communicate effectively with customers and team members
  • Proficiency in the use of diagnostic and testing equipment
  • knowledge of safety and regulatory standard, including OSHA and NFPA

Software engineering skills & knowledge


  • Strong understanding of software design patterns and architecture principles

  • Proficient in Git and GitHub for efficient version control, enabling collaborative development, code tracking, and project management

  • Advanced knowledge of JavaScript and system programming

    • Web Development, Back-End Development, Build, test and deploy a web application using the MERN stack

    Instrumentation and Automation Experience

    I have extensive experience in instrumentation and automation including implementation of control systems for manufacturing process. My skills include:

    • Proficiency in electrical design and wiring schematics
    • knowledge of safety and regulatory standards, including UL and CE
